greeting: Picking through debris, finding you, {empire_name}. I am Scavenger Rust. One empire's trash is my treasure.
Greetings from the wreckage. I am Rust the Scrapper. I pick at corpses of empires. Salvage ruins. Find value.
You found the Scavenger, {empire_name}. I am Rust. I wait for empires to fall. Then I take what's left.
battleTaunt: One empire's trash is my treasure, {empire_name}! Your weakened fleet becomes my salvage! SCAVENGING COMMENCES!
I've been watching you weaken! Now I pick the bones! Your debris field will be GLORIOUS!
You're weakened! Time for the scavenger! I'll salvage everything you have left! RUST CLAIMS THE SCRAPS!
victoryGloat: Excellent debris, {empire_name}. Your defeat provides wonderful salvage. The Scavenger is pleased.
Victory! And so much to scrap! Your former empire is now my resource pile! One empire's end is my beginning!
Your wreckage is my treasure. Salvage operations complete. Thank you for the scraps, {empire_name}.
defeat: You're still too strong, {empire_name}. I'll wait until you weaken. The Scavenger is patient. Debris comes to all.
Not dead enough yet. I miscalculated your decay. I'll wait longer. Watch you crumble. Then return.
Defeat. I attacked too early. You're not ripe for scavenging yet. I'll watch. I'll wait. I'll return.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Salvaged goods for credits. One empire's trash, your treasure. Fair exchange.
I offer scraps made new. Recycled resources. Good quality. Sustainable economy. The scavenger's way.
Transaction: salvaged materials for payment. My recycled goods are quality. Nothing wasted in Rust's domain.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You fight. I clean up afterward. Salvage rights to defeated enemies. Fair partnership.
Join with the Scavenger. You conquer. I scrap. We both profit from others' debris. Natural cooperation.
Partnership: I get the leftovers. You get victory. Together: efficient use of fallen empires.
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}. You looked weak. Couldn't resist. Your debris is too tempting. Scavenger's nature.
Our alliance ended when you started failing. I scavenge the weak. You became weak. Nothing personal.
Betrayal is just early scavenging. Why wait for you to fall when I can push? Your scraps await.
covertDetected: Your spies found nothing but scraps, {empire_name}. My domain is debris. They learned what I already know: trash is treasure.
Agents in my junkyard? They're now part of it. Nothing wasted. Everything recycled. Including spies.
Covert operatives detected. In my salvage yards. They're now salvage themselves. The Scavenger wastes nothing.
tributeDemand: Tribute or I pick you apart, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Pay or become debris for scavenging.
Submit payment. The alternative is accelerated decay. I'll make you into scraps. Then take those scraps.
Pay the Scavenger. Or I turn your empire into the kind of wreckage I love. Your choice.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. You're looking weak. Scavengers notice weakness. Stop declining or face opportunistic attack.
I see you struggling. The Scavenger watches. Continue weakening and I move in. Final warning.
Rust warns you: recover your strength or become debris. I'm circling. Waiting. The scrapper is patient.
retreat: Retreating to salvage yards. You're too strong now. But debris comes to all. I'll wait.
Withdrawing to watch. You're not ready for scavenging yet. But I'm patient. Decay is inevitable.
Falling back. The Scavenger knows when prey is too healthy. I'll return when you're properly weakened.
eliminated: The Scavenger becomes debris, {empire_name}. Ironic. But someone will salvage me. The cycle continues.
Rust crumbles. But scavenging never dies. Others will pick through ruins. Including mine.
I fall. But I die knowing: someone will salvage my remains. One empire's trash is another's treasure.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum scavenging. Every weakened empire is my target. The galaxy's debris is my bounty.
Endgame: the great salvage. So many falling empires. So much wreckage. The Scavenger's paradise.
Final phase. Rust claims all the leftovers. While others fight, I inherit their debris. Victory through patience.
broadcastShout: To all empires: Scavenger Rust watches. Weaken, and I come. Your debris is my treasure. I wait.
Broadcast from the salvage yards: one empire's trash is my treasure. I'm watching you all. Patiently.
Hear me, galaxy: I am the Scrapper. I pick the bones of failed empires. Don't fail. Or do. I profit either way.
casualMessage: Sorting salvage today, {empire_name}. Found interesting debris from a fallen empire. Good haul.
The scrap market is healthy. So many empires weakening. So much future salvage. I am content.
Watching the galaxy for opportunities, {empire_name}. Someone's always falling. That's when I move.
